method.name: Configure

method.name: QueryParameters
method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Should only be called in the driver thread.

method.description: Updates the driver parameters in the driver environment. Might be called out of thread. Implementation MUST be able to handle parallel calls.

class.name: Driver_Spinnaker
class.description: A Driver for the Teledyne Spinnaker SDK.

method.name: SetCustomSDKResource
method.description: Sets the machine resource name of the SpinnakerC SDK to load. MUST be called before Connect or it has no effect.

param.name: ResourceName
param.description: Resource name of core machine package. Empty means standard naming applies.

method.name: ConnectToUniqueGenericDevice
method.description: Checks if there is exactly only one generic device connected and connects to it..

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the connection. Fails if identifier is already existing. MUST be non-empty a alpanumerical string with _, up until 64 characters.

method.name: ConnectToUniqueGigEDevice
method.description: Checks if there is exactly only one GigE device connected and connects to it..

param.name: Identifier
param.description: Identifier for the connection. Fails if identifier is already existing. MUST be non-empty a alpanumerical string with _, up until 64 characters.

method.name: ConnectionExists
method.description: Checks if a connection exists with a certain identifier.

param.name: Exists
param.description: Returns true, if the connection exists, false otherwise.

method.name: FindDeviceConnection
method.description: Returns a connection by an identifier. Fails if connection does not exist.

method.name: CloseAllConnections
method.description: Closes all connections.
